directions.text: Grind everything together in a coffee grinder.
Sift through a sieve, and re-grind remains.  Mix together everything, including incompletely ground pieces.
Store, tightly covered, away from light.
(Makes the amount that fits in a 6-fl oz. container.)
Notes:  This is a nice, aromatic recipe that can be optionally be combined with fresh ginger.  If you want it spicier, add more dry ginger and  Peppercorns.

ingredients.comment: or 4 complete stars (do not use Japanese star anise.  It is poisonous.  Use Chinese only.  If you can't find this, you can use some quantity of Anise seed or soonf.)
(more if you want it to be hotter)
